title: U.S. Team To Assist Nigeria In Locating Kidnapped School Girls
teaser: Steve Inskeep talks to retired Gen. Carter Ham about U.S. assistance to Nigeria to help locate and rescue kidnapped school girls. Ham was the commander of the U.S. African Command from 2011 to 2013.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
